column1: Kata Robata////I have not tried the sushi
column2: which is supposed to be pretty good
column3: but the ramen today was subpar. The atmosphere in the restaurant was nice but the aesthetic pleasantness did not make up for the lukewarm
column4: bland broth and undercooked noodles. I have to say it
column5: will be difficult for someone to convince me to revisit this establishment.
